Job Title: Senior Technical Writer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Goldbelt Glacier is accelerating healthcare delivery and providing superior force health readiness across the military, federal, and civilian landscapes. Goldbelt Glacier is committed to providing transformative and comprehensive health operational capabilities to support customers across scientific, clinical, technological, and program management areas.

Summary:

The Office of Renewable Energy Programs (OREP), under the Department of Interior, is experiencing a significant workload increase associated with the Administration’s target of completing the full environmental and technical reviews of 16 Construction and Operations plans for offshore wind projects by the end of 2025. As a result, the OREP needs to be able to quickly adjust to increases and decreases in administrative, professional, and other support services. Personnel are required to provide administrative, professional, and other support services in several different areas of work for the OREP.

Responsibilities

 Essential Job Functions: 

 Applies writing and editing skills and specialized vocabulary of appropriate subject matter fields to develop and review accurate communication materials with environmental, scientific, and technical information suited to various audiences.  Gathers technical information from subject matter experts and others and applies experience in editing to analyze, interpret, and integrate technical information in various formats.  Prepares products developed by others for publication and ensuring the materials are clear, comprehensible, logical, and conclusions are valid and supported by references to facts.  Reviews documents and written materials to ensure communications products are consistent with DOI policy, adhere to Section 508 Compliance requirements, meet BOEM style requirements and are written at an appropriate level for the intended audiences.  Articulates, explains, writes, and edits technical information clearly without sacrificing thoroughness and accuracy.  Advises and assists in the writing phase of documents and reports, consults on design and graphics, ensures 508 compliance requirements are incorporated, and prepares material for printing or posting on the website and other social media.  Coordinates and collaborates with OREP’s scientific and technical experts to ensure accuracy and quality of the content of documents and information. 

Qualifications

 Necessary Skills and Knowledge: 

 Excellent oral and written communication skills.  Strong customer service acumen and professional demeanor.  Critical thinking and problem-solving skills.  Ability to adapt to a fast-paced work/office environment and maintain accuracy under pressure.  Competency in managing schedules, documentation, and automated systems.  Ability to interpret and analyze complex information.  Capacity to work independently within the bounds and guidelines of contract and customer requirements.  Proficiency in using the Microsoft Office Suite. 

 Minimum Qualifications: 

 A Bachelor of Science Degree in environmental science, engineering.  3 years of related work experience.  Previous experience with 508 compliance requirements.  US Citizen.  Ability to successfully pass a background check. 

 Preferred Qualifications: 

 Previous work experience with the Federal Government.  Previous experience or expertise in wind energy and environmental science.  Previous experience in a scientific research organization. 

The salary range for this position is $85,000 - $95,000.

Pay And Benefits

At Goldbelt, we value and reward our team's dedication and hard work. We provide a competitive base salary commensurate with your qualifications and experience. As an employee, you'll enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) plan with company matching, tax-deferred savings options, supplementary benefits, paid time off, and professional development opportunities.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
